content: My brother had one, more specifically, an aversion to the fat that typically surrounds non-ground cuts of meat. I sat next to him at the dinner table.* His aversion to fat bordered on the pathological. One evening I showed him that strands of fat can be detected anywhere in any cut of meat provided one looks at it closely enough. My mother never forgave me. *My stay-at-home mom was old school.We had family sit down dinners every evening. That is, until her consciousness disappeared down the neck of a wine bottle.
